name: test_e2e_with_logs[EMRG_MONGO_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `EMRG_MONGO_001` |
| **Name** | MongoDB $where JavaScript injection |
| **Category** | OTHER |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"$where": "this.username == 'admin'"}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22%24where%22%3A%20%22this.username%20%3D%3D%20%27admin%27%22%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `EMRG_NOSQL_001` |
| **Expected Rule** | Emerging Threat: NoSQL/MongoDB Injection |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_001-1765107729256-fbs6o pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_001 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24where%22%3A%20%22this.username%20%3D%3D%20%27admin%27%22%7D client=127.0.0.1 |
| **Match Status** | `MISMATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~2000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:42:09.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_001-1765107729256-fbs6o pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_001 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24where%22%3A%20%22this.username%20%3D%3D%20%27admin%27%22%7D client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
